samples.question: And what do you like most about your job?
samples.transcript: This job is full of, challenges and you have to be always at the tip of the technology, learn a lot of new things and keep up with the tools and new, emerging technologies. So that is what I like about it. So you do not get into a daily routines that is nothing new and you constantly learning.

samples.question: What do you usually do in your free time?
samples.transcript: I am very active in my free time. Normally do physical activities, go to gym, or I do go running outside most of the time when it is summer. But in winter, I go to gym or go to go swimming pool. but in winter also, I am very, interested in snowboarding. Okay.

samples.question: Do you prefer indoor or outdoor activities?
samples.transcript: I do prefer, going, outdoor, and do outdoor activities. Running outside is one of the main things I do in summer. But because in Canada, winter is very cold, you cannot do that through the year. so I normally, stay inside in winter, but, in, in winter, but sometimes I go snowboarding when the temperature is not that harsh.

samples.question: How do major life events such as moving to a new city or changing jobs affect a person's routine?
samples.transcript: I can say it through my experience. so I recently did that. I moved from another city to here. And it just changed everything you have been doing. So you have a very fixed routine every day when to wake up, what to do, you know the plan of the day, what you want, what you can do. But, these kind of changes, make you, make your life more chaotic. you do not know what comes next in a short time in very temporary. so that is what happened in my life until I, we found our apartment, our house, so we are to live. And again, finding the paths where how to go to the work and all those things. So it requires a lot of efforts to learn what to do and bring it back to where it was in the past routine you have. Okay.

samples.question: So do you think that people learn more from their success or their failure?
samples.transcript: I think this is a very, well-known, quote that you learn more from your failures and, defeats than your, success. And the reason is, success happens very rarely in your life, but failures happen a lot more if you do not stay unsure and just take the endeavors. Yeah, is in front of you. So every challenges you have, you learn one thing new. If, if you, stay in your comfort zone, you make no mistake. So you do not learn anything. But if you just get out of your comfort zone, that is where you, you come to the realm of unknowns. So you make mistakes, you learn things, you become better and you gain a lot of knowledge. A lot of experiences that you never known before and now you, it is part of your knowledge and your experience. Okay.

samples.question: And do you spend much time with your family?
samples.transcript: Absolutely. It depends on different factors and parameters, I strongly believe. But when it comes to talking about the family, I do accept this as true that speaking about family has been an issue about which there has been considerable hostility with a strongly belief. And I think it does have an important role when you are in your family and you are spending time with your family members. And specifically, for example, I wanted to enjoy playing piano and my brother actually plays guitar at the same time. Maybe we can have some events together. And also I try to stay with my family more often. Okay, that is wonderful.
